name: weather-agent-kd
description: Weather agent using Mastra with AI-generated weather reports and audio

scripts.test:stt:deepgram: npm run build && node dist/scripts/test-stt.js files/sample.wav deepgram
scripts.test:stt:cartesia: npm run build && node dist/scripts/test-stt.js files/sample.wav cartesia
scripts.test:tts:deepgram: npm run build && node dist/scripts/test-tts.js 'Testing Deepgram text to speech.' deepgram
scripts.test:tts:cartesia: npm run build && node dist/scripts/test-tts.js 'Testing Cartesia text to speech.' cartesia
scripts.test:all: npm run test:zip && npm run test:claude && npm run test:weather-agent && npm run test:stt && npm run test:tts
